---
title: "Slides Redirect"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
  warning: false
  error: false
  eval: false
---
<script>
  // Slides organized by topic
  const slidesByTopic = {
    "EDA": {
      "EDA1": "https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vXiVFaSsBIhlHjO_p1hXRefWfyRjFdsBXQVJslPyF_g/edit?slide=id.g3a1af70067d_1_0#slide=id.g3a1af70067d_1_0",
      "EDA2": "https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vXiVFaSsBIhlHjO_p1hXRefWfyRjFdsBXQVJslPyF_g/edit?slide=id.g3a1af70067d_2_16#slide=id.g3a1af70067d_2_16",
      "EDA3": "https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vXiVFaSsBIhlHjO_p1hXRefWfyRjFdsBXQVJslPyF_g/edit?slide=id.g3a1af70067d_2_11#slide=id.g3a1af70067d_2_11"
    },
    "EVL": {
      "EVL1":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GtvpOFBLJzXoIgXyQgwvJR5PDyIkhCuacD80LlGRHic/edit?slide=id.g323999f4ad1_0_263#slide=id.g323999f4ad1_0_263",
      "EVL2":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GtvpOFBLJzXoIgXyQgwvJR5PDyIkhCuacD80LlGRHic/edit?slide=id.g32c0696979f_0_98#slide=id.g32c0696979f_0_98",
      "EVL3":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GtvpOFBLJzXoIgXyQgwvJR5PDyIkhCuacD80LlGRHic/edit?slide=id.g32c0696979f_0_104#slide=id.g32c0696979f_0_104"
    },
    "CLS": {"CLS1":"","CLS2":"","CLS3":""},
    "DATA": {"DATA1":"","DATA2":"","DATA3":""},
    "MOD": {"TREE1":"","TREE2":"","KNN":"","LIN1":"","LIN2":"","SVM":""},
    "ENS": {"ENS1":"","ENS2":"","ENS3":""},
    "NN": {"NN1":"","NN2":"","NN3":""},
    "DL": {"DL1":"","DL2":"","DL3":""}
  };

  // Flatten slides for redirect lookup
  const slidesFlat = {};
  for (const topic in slidesByTopic) {
    Object.assign(slidesFlat, slidesByTopic[topic]);
  }

  // Read ?q= parameter
  const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  const target = params.get("q");

  if (target && slidesFlat[target]) {
    // Redirect if valid
    window.location.replace(slidesFlat[target]);
  } else {
    // Build HTML for grouped topics
    document.write("<h2>Select a slide deck:</h2>");
    for (const topic in slidesByTopic) {
      document.write(`<div style="border:1px solid #ccc; padding:10px; margin:10px 0; border-radius:6px;">`);
      document.write(`<h3>${topic} Slides</h3>`);
      for (const key in slidesByTopic[topic]) {
        const url = slidesByTopic[topic][key];
        if (url) {
          document.write(`<a href="?q=${key}" style="display:inline-block; margin:4px; padding:6px 12px; background-color:#e0e0e0; border-radius:4px; text-decoration:none;">${key}</a>`);
        } else {
          document.write(`<span style="display:inline-block; margin:4px; padding:6px 12px; background-color:#f0f0f0; border-radius:4px; color:#888;">${key}</span>`);
        }
      }
      document.write("</div>");
    }
  }
</script>
